features.name: Summary
features.description: Score for this machine, as compared to similar machines

features.name: Failed domains
features.description: Number of domains which this machine attempted to access, but failed

features.name: Random domains
features.description: Random domains which were successfully accessed by this machine

features.name: Domain sequences
features.description: Large sequences of domain suffixes (.com, .org, .info, .ru, .co.uk, etc.)

features.name: Unique domains
features.description: Domains accessed only once by this machine
